job.title: Senior Cloud and Data Security Engineer - can work at any II-VI location
job.description: Due to ITAR compliance, this position requires candidates to be a U.S. Citizen, Permanent Resident Alien, or Protected Individual per 8 U.S.C. 1324b(a)(3). II-VI Inc. is seeking a lead Cloud and Data Security Engineer to join our dedicated Security team.This is a great opportunity to be part of the IT and security transformation journey which are in progress.Our ideal candidate will have a passion for cloud security and data privacy and a commitment to accuracy and execution. We are looking for someone with strong cloud security, application security, access management, automation and scripting, cloud (Azure/AWS) experience, good communication and analytics skills. Previous experience in coordinating projects and the ability to work cross-functionally is preferred. You will be securing the cutting-edge product and technology using various security protection and detection tools, analyze risk, document and standardize procedures, plan and implement projects. Ideally, a job description should be reviewed annually and updated as often as necessary. Ensure adherence to company’s values (ICARE) in all aspects of your position at II-VI: ntegrity – Create an Environment of Trust ollaboration – Innovate Through the Sharing of Ideas ccountability – Own the Process and the Outcome espect – Recognize the Value in Everyone nthusiasm – Find a Sense of Purpose in Work  II-VI is an equal opportunity/affirmative action employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to sex, gender identity, sexual orientation, race, color, religion, national origin, disability, protected Veteran status, age, or any other characteristic protected by law. II-VI is a global leader in engineered materials and optoelectronic components and is a vertically integrated manufacturing company that develops innovative products for diversified applications in the industrial, optical communications, military, life sciences, semiconductor equipment, and consumer markets. II-VI provides a comprehensive career development platform within an environment that challenges employees to perform at their best, while rewarding excellence and hard-work through a competitive compensation program. It's an exciting opportunity to work for a company that offers stability, longevity and growth. Come Join Us!
